item.title: How Russia’s War Machine Brutalizes and Exploits Its Own Soldiers
item.description: Confidential complaints filed by troops and their families reveal patterns of wrongdoing in the ranks that are hidden from the Russian public.

item.title: Thailand Releases 18 Cambodian P.O.W.s
item.description: The repatriation of the Cambodian soldiers captured in July comes on the heels of a 72-hour cease-fire that could end months of border skirmishes.
